    About Me

    BIO

    My name is Tomi West, and I currently reside in Helsinki, Finland. I've worked as a freelance musician for 9 years, and been teaching music for 5 years. I'm currently studying at Metropolia University of Applied Sciences, acquiring both a degree in performance and teaching.

    List of hobbies include reading books, running. Favorite reading subjects are ancient history and biographies, and anything by J.R.R Tolkien. I also picked up an interest for programming and have basic proficiency in Python, c++ STL and Qt and plan to continue to expand my skills in these topics.

    Musician

    Guitarist

    Rock, Jazz, Blues, Pop you name it, I would consider myself as a versatile musician with skills in all areas of music. I've played at venues big and small, couple highlights include Hartwall arena in 2015 and Sein√§joen tangomarkkinat 2015, multiple TV performances and musical theater productions.

    Teacher

    Methodology

    My teaching methodology is based on positive pedagogy. Which is to help the student identify her/hes own strengths and weaknesses. Build the students skills based on their strengths, desires, interest, prior experience, rather than focus on their problems and so called "weaknesses" perceived by others. By reinforcing what students are good at, you build up their self-esteem and to recognise their own strengths. And when they inevitably encounter setbacks, not only in music but in life in general, they have a proper foundation to take support from.

    Producer

    Commercial music, Live Track production, Booking Agent

    I've written music for companies to use music in their promotional material. I use Ableton 10 Live for all my music production and writing. With The combination of real and virtual instuments I can achieve modern sounding tracks efficiently and fast.
